name: CommunityResourcesForFoodInsecurity
title: Community resources for food insecurity
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is to capture state-based community resources specifically identified and provided to the patient to mitigate positive food insecurity.),(Data Element Scope: Referral ordered or procedure performed),(Inclusion Criteria: Evaluation of eligibility, assistance with or referral to a community meal program, or other meal or food distribution program such as Child and Adult Care Food Program or provision of or order for food or tailored meals or referral to dietician for food services.),(Exclusion Criteria: Other other codes not meeting inclusion criteria are excluded.)
